name: Flap To The Moon
description:
My first project.

You're just a lonely chicken, and you want to fly to the moon!

Use the arrow keys to move and hold Spacebar to fly. Esc pauses the game.

Dodge the stars, collect the five secret collectibles, and make it to the moon to win!

Music and SFX borrowed from Nintendo.

Made in the Bronx Science Game Development class.

Mac version coming soon.
